div.p: TO ONE OF THE TWO PLANETS?
OH, I HAD TO BEAM THEM DOWN.
AS FAR AS WE CAN TELL,
BUT IT IS GAINING ON US.
WE CAN'T LET IT GO BEYOND US
IF WE GET THIS HULK MOVING,
LET'S SEE WHAT WE CAN DO
SCOTTY, GET US OUT OF HERE.
THE BEST I CAN GIVE YOU
NO ONE EXPECTS YOU TO DIE
I'M GOING TO RAM HER RIGHT
DIED IN THE LINE OF DUTY.
